thread.title: Lora
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Lora

author: Lora
title: Lora
text: My husband and I are avid shop around types, we never jump into large purchases. We found Home Zone to be very reasonably priced, quality products. The staff members are all helpful and friendly, no pushy sales in this store. We found exactly what we wanted and they helped us with purchase options. They have multiply purchase options that make buying what you find easier and possible on just about any budget. We are refurnishing the majority of our home bit by bit, we are on a budget after all, but we have found everything we want and need at Home Zone in Sherman TX. We greatly appreciate the excellent sales and customer service provided by the staff and management. We tell everyone where they need to go for home furnishings.
